If they start reading through your trading plan and they're like, hey, well, what do you do in this scenario? That tells you that you're not defining that quite well enough and you probably should think through it because if there's too much variability in your capacity to deploy, there's a good chance that you are going to pick route A sometimes route B sometimes and then you're not going to understand what works best over the long run.
